title: Math Academic Writing Support Circle for Graduate Students

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental grasp of graduate-level mathematical theories and research methodologies
context.additional_context: Collaborative learning environment construction for strengthening research paper writing competencies in mathematics

learning_goals: Learners can revise and improve their drafts of mathematical academic papers at least three times through peer review.
Participants experience the process of providing and incorporating peer feedback at least five times in subject-specific writing support circles.
All learners complete one full paper in international journal format by the end of the six-month course.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
